refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

warning.para: GnomePixmapPrivate is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.
GnomePixmap is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.title: gnome_pixmap_new_from_file ()

warning.para: gnome_pixmap_new_from_file is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para:
<programlisting>
pixbuf = gdk_pixbuf_new_from_file (filename);
if (pixbuf != NULL) {
        gpixmap = gtk_image_new_from_pixbuf (pixbuf);
} else {
        // handle your error...
}
</programlisting>

listitem.simpara: The filename of the file to be loaded.
A newly allocated GnomePixmap with the file at filename loaded.

refsect2.title: gnome_pixmap_new_from_file_at_size ()

warning.para: gnome_pixmap_new_from_file_at_size is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Loads a new GnomePixmap from a file, and scales it (if necessary) to the size indicated by height and width. If either are set to -1, then the "natural" dimension of the image is used in place. See gnome_pixmap_new_from_file for information on error handling.

listitem.simpara: The filename of the file to be loaded.
The width to scale the image to.
The height to scale the image to.
value: A newly allocated GnomePixmap with the file at filename loaded.

refsect2.title: gnome_pixmap_new_from_xpm_d ()

warning.para: gnome_pixmap_new_from_xpm_d is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Loads a new GnomePixmap from the xpm_data, and scales it (if necessary) to the size indicated by height and width. If either are set to -1, then the "natural" dimension of the image is used in place.

listitem.simpara: The xpm data to be loaded.
value: A newly allocated GnomePixmap with the image from xpm_data loaded.

refsect2.title: gnome_pixmap_new_from_xpm_d_at_size ()

warning.para: gnome_pixmap_new_from_xpm_d_at_size is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Loads a new GnomePixmap from the xpm_data, and scales it (if necessary) to the size indicated by height and width. If either are set to -1, then the "natural" dimension of the image is used in place.

listitem.simpara: The xpm data to be loaded.
The width to scale the image to.
The height to scale the image to.
value: A newly allocated GnomePixmap with the image from xpm_data loaded.

warning.para: gnome_pixmap_new_from_gnome_pixmap is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.
gnome_pixmap_load_file is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.title: gnome_pixmap_load_file_at_size ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gnome_pixmap_load_file_at_size (GnomePixmap *gpixmap, const char *filename, int width, int height);

warning.para: gnome_pixmap_load_file_at_size is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.
gnome_pixmap_load_xpm_d is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.title: gnome_pixmap_load_xpm_d_at_size ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gnome_pixmap_load_xpm_d_at_size (GnomePixmap *gpixmap, const char **xpm_data, int width, int height);

warning.para: gnome_pixmap_load_xpm_d_at_size is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.
